summary: VR Chat Meme comes to life with this Mod
descriptionHtml:
Right lets start this off with this:

THIS MOD IS A WIP(WORK IN PROGRESS), I HAVE CREATED THIS MOD PAGE TO SERVE AS A BACKUP TO SAVE THE MOD TOO IN THE EVENT OF SOMETHING GOING WRONG.
I INTEND TO CREATE THIS MOD VERY QUICKLY BUT MAY BE DELAYED SO PLEASE BARE WITH ME.Â 
I RECOMMEND NOT DOWNLOADING THE MOD UNTIL VERSION 3 OR UNTIL I HAVE UPLOADED AN IMAGE OF THE MODEL.

There we go, now that we have that covered. Lets move onto the mod description.

[b][size=4]Description[/size][/b]
Uganda Knuckles Follower mod is exactly as it sounds, our "[i]cute[/i]" little meme from the depths of VR Chat has arrived in Skyrim.
He will spit on the fake queens and find [i]dae wae [/i]to your companionship.

There will be custom voice acting.
There will be questions about knowing [i]dae wae[/i].
There will be spiting.
And There will be finding the Queen.


[size=4]How to Install[/size]
You cant install it currently, I have yet to upload the file

[size=4]Where is he?
[/size]Not sure yet, haven't decided yet

[size=4]Credits
[/size]Creator of Mod: EltarGaming A.K.A Me

Other credits coming soon as soon as I add the content of those respective creators.
author: EltarGaming
